name: Geo-koala-android-client
tagline: Client for the GeoKoala public REST Api.
body:
### Welcome to Geo-koala-android-client.
A simple android client that that executes: â€¦
http://api.reaperfire.com/reaperfire/#!/events/saveEvents  when a user
clicks 'submit'.  the app sends the user's current lat/log to the
server

```
$ cd your_repo_root/geo-koala-android-client
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.
 
### Authors and Contributors
Jeryl Cook @VanitySoft

### Support or Contact
Check out the API documentation at http://api.reaperfire.com/reaperfire or contact jeryl.cook@vanity-soft.com.
if you want your own appkey, shoot me an email!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
